pageContext.claim: “We won court cases, we won court cases, we won. Like I won so much money, we can build four walls if we want it.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump did not win any money; he diverted Defense Department resources to fund the project. The Supreme Court has yet to rule on whether his actions are legal, though they lifted a lower court order blocking a key part of his plan. Meanwhile, other litigation by landowners and others has delayed construction.
